Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'The two mechanoids energetically kick open the door, and a noisy wave of music pours out, enveloping you.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: "You've got the nerve to show your face again, Thunder Sparks!"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "We're here to beat you this time, Abyssal Ragetide!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: "Wait, you brought the Gray Raven Commandant?! That's unfair!"}
{2: "I'm that famous right now...?", 3: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Huh? You didn't know? Ever since the Paradise Festival, your name has been buzzing all over Constellia.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy blinks at you, signaling you to refrain from speaking, as she skillfully steps in to separate the nearly fighting mechanoids.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: "...You've already lost everything in our last bet, even this practice spot. What else do you have left to throw down against us?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'How about... we put the Gray Raven Commandant on the line as the wager this time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'U-use me as the wager?', 3: '18', 4: 'What?!', 5: '18'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Just for a one-time promotion fee... What do you say? It's the Gray Raven Commandant we're talking about here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'Hmm...'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: "Alright! We can give it a try! But we get to set the rules, and it's gonna be a mashup competition again!"}
{3: 'The mechanoid named Ragetide erupts into a cackling laugh.'}
{3: 'Before Kiske can respond, Teddy quickly answers on his behalf.'}
{3: 'As per the agreed rules, both parties have a designated preparation period.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: 'Confidently, Abyssal Ragetide strides into their recording studio, as Kiske guides you and Teddy to the room that once belonged to Thunder Sparks.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "Oh no... This is not just about a drummer missing this time. We don't even have a full band right now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'I acted too impulsively... Maybe I should go back to being a beat painter...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Your confidence seems to be as fragile as industrial ash...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sitting upright, Teddy awkwardly presses a few buttons on the instrument keyboard.', 4: ' '}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Alright, just stay there and don't get in my way.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if opening a magical realm, she concurrently activates three terminal simulation screens, her hands swiftly typing away and occasionally striking peculiar chords.'}
{2: '...', 3: '43', 4: "Why do you look like you understand what she's doing?", 5: '43'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "I don't. I just think it looks impressive.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Entering work mode, Teddy's concentration is almost intimidating. She is wholly engrossed in the code flowing across the screens, appearing oblivious to the surrounding environment."}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'Do you think she would say yes if I offered her some gas-booze?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No.', 3: '47', 4: "Don't even think about it.", 5: '47', 6: "That's not going to happen.", 7: '47'}
{3: "Regardless of how you perceive it, Teddy doesn't appear to be the type to enjoy something with such an unusual flavor."}
{3: 'Time flies in this cramped recording studio.'}
{3: "It doesn't take long before Abyssal Ragetide comes knocking loudly at the door."}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'Hey, Thunder Sparks! Are you done?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'She unplugs the storage device from the terminal, winks at you, and then follows the mechanoid out.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'Since this is our turf, we go first this time according to the rules.'}
{3: 'He confidently plugs his storage device into the player.'}
{3: 'The player erupts with raucous sound waves. The rapid drumbeats and energetic strumming ignite the entire underground music venue to a fever pitch.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: 'Abyssal Ragetide is even stronger this time... Their mashup is so long and covers such a wide range of notes, ugh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "This is bad. We're done for this time...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I was wrong. Seems like industrial ash might just be tougher than your confidence.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I told you. Just leave it all to me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the song finished, Ragetide looks triumphantly at Kiske.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'So, are you still going to play your track? Or should we just let the Gray Raven Commandant help promote our next concert?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hold your horses. Wait until we... uh, we Thunder Sparks play our track.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a somewhat dubious smile, the pink-haired Construct approaches the player.'}
{3: "It's too late to stop her. With that dubious smile, Teddy inserts the storage device into the player."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Get set for our mashup track, a soulful performance sung by the commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Familiar and unmistakable, your own voice starts to play from the speakers.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Huh? No, this isn't work. Just a little synthesis program.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Disassemble, synthesize, and reassemble.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'Disassemble the sound, synthesize it, and reassemble it into a new track?!'}
{3: 'However it came about, you never expected Teddy would produce a track sung by you in such a short period.'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "The Gray Raven Commandant is really something else! You've got to hold a concert here next time!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And just like that, the song has concluded amid the cheers of the crowd.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: "I can't believe it's personally sung by the Gray Raven Commandant!"}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: "But... I still think Abyssal Ragetide has the edge! Your track isn't measuring up to ours in length or breadth..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "I didn't say that we only made this one track.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'What?!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Keep listening.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seemingly assured of victory, Teddy switches to another track on the player.'}
{3: 'The powerful singing stretches high into the clouds, while the deep resonance reverberates in the abyss, leaving nothing more fluid and harmonious than this piece.'}
{3: 'It appears to encompass all musical forms, seamlessly transitioning through different melodies, as all the mechanoids fall silent, captivated by the music.'}
{3: 'With the track concluded, the outcome stands clear.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: "No way. Thunder Sparks couldn't reach such a level..."}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'Cheater! You must be cheating!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hmm? Do you have any proof?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'That high-pitched section and this part... These beats are straight-up impossible to perform!'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'You must have used some kind of technology...!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Oh? Didn't you use any?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'W-we...'}
{3: 'Mechanoids can never be good liars.'}
{3: 'After Teddy exposes the parts they performed using programmed algorithms one by one, Ragetide finally lower their heads.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'We did use... an algorithm program.'}
{2: 'Ragetide', 3: 'If I were to buy it, could you sell me the program you used, Miss Construct?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Sorry, but I refuse.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She casually taps the screen twice, and the little program she just wrote smoothly slips into the recycle bin.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'At any rate... you lost.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Where are Thunder Sparks' collections? It's time to return them.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Reluctantly, Abyssal Ragetide admits their defeat. After returning Thunder Sparks' collections and practice spot, the small group of mechanoids slinks out of the area."}
{2: "I didn't see that coming.", 3: '131'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "You're not mad?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'About me using your voice to produce that mashup?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You are certainly not mad, and in the end, it's not that big of a deal."}
{2: 'What you did is impressive.', 3: '136', 4: "I honestly didn't see that coming.", 5: '136'}
{3: 'Upon witnessing her craft such a complex program from scratch in a brief span, you come to realize that you may have underestimated this genius technician before.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "There's even more impressive stuff you don't know about.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct curls her lips into a nonchalant smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "...Found it! Thank goodness! They haven't sold it yet!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kiske delicately retrieves a pair of wireless headphones from the storage room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'll transfer the agreed price directly to your account.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She carefully takes the headphones, inspecting their quality.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Wow... These are in pristine condition. This kind of stuff is exclusive to this place, you know.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "Here's the extra payment I promised earlier. I traded for it with Little Sam.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The mechanoid presents a mysterious gift box to Teddy before fumblingly taking out something else.'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "Oh, and... this is a little something special to say thank you. I feel like what I've paid doesn't quite match up to your hard work, so...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: "I found this in my collections. Kind Construct Lady, you'll find it pretty interesting.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kiske', 3: "It's something from well before the Golden Age, back when we traveled across the surface with Cervantes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'I did what I could to restore them and even found a matching little box.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'This is for you, kind Construct Lady.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kiske', 3: 'You helped Thunder Sparks, so we thought we would give something back. I hope it makes your day brighter.', 4: '1'}
